Try again later.
I Accept Done
Create a new API Key on your phone
Open Menu
Open API Page
Create API Key
Enter Info To AnyX
On the Coinbase Pro mobile site, click the menu icon in the upper right hand corner.
Select API from the menu.
On the API Page, select View, Transfer, and Trade permissions. You may also set your own Passphrase. \nAs long as you select View you will be able to track your account holdings in the app, but due to the way AnyX processes trades you need the other three permissions to buy or sell assets.
Copy the API key and API secret into AnyX\'s login screen. Save these in the app so you don\'t have to go through this process again. You\'re good to go!
Create a new API Key on your computer
Log in to the Coinbase Pro website and click the menu icon in the upper right hand corner.
Choose API from the right hand menu.
On the API Page, select View, Transfer, and Trade permissions. You may also set your own Passphrase. \nAs long as you select View you will be able to track your account holdings in the app, but due to the way AnyX processes trades you need the other three permissions to buy or sell assets.
Copy down the info into the AnyX login screen. Make sure you do not send this info on any unencrypted channels to prevent someone from hacking your account
Before you verify your account, please read and accept our User Agreement and Privacy Policy
AnyX User Agreement and Privacy Policy User Agreement AnyX can only be used to view and track, transfer, and manage supported Digital Currencies using Coinbase Pro’s services. AnyX does not take responsibility for any failed transactions of any time. AnyX does not take responsibility for any Digital Currency Transactions sent to the wrong recipient. You should verify all transaction information prior to submitting instructions to AnyX When you place an order which is not immediately matched by an existing order, you will not have to pay fees. However, when you place an order at the market price that gets filled immediately, you will pay AnyX a fee of 0.1% on top of fees charged by Coinbase Pro. Due to the way these fees are processed, sometimes you will not pay that fee immediately but it will be added on to the next fee you incur. AnyX reserves the right to change fee pricing at a later date.
By using AnyX, you also agree to Coinbase’s User Agreement, found here:\nhttps://www.coinbase.com/legal/user_agreement The risk of loss in trading or holding Digital Currency can be substantial. You should therefore carefully consider whether trading or holding Digital Currency is suitable for you in light of your financial condition.
Privacy Policy AnyX does not save any of your data. Your Coinbase Pro Api Key, Api Secret, and Passphrase are only stored locally on your device. \nWe do not save any pictures taken with the camera, they are only used to capture QR codes.
Enter a %s address and the amount you wish to transfer from your Coinbase Pro trading account. %s transfers are free and fast. Warning: Please double check the destination address before sending, and ensure that it is a %s (%s) address.
Enter an ETH address and the amount you wish to transfer from your Coinbase Pro trading account. ETH transfers are free and fast. Warning: Do not send ETH from Coinbase Pro directly to an Ethereum contract. Sending to a contract may result in lost ETH. Read more here:\nhttps://support.Coinbase Pro.com/customer/en/portal/articles/2430150
